text: can write math expressions, e.g. \(Y = X\beta + \epsilon\), footnotes1, tables, e.g. using knitr::kable(). Also quote using >: “gives [code] safety [code] speed deserves neither.” (via) “gives [code] safety [code] speed deserves neither.” (via)
